content: Always be prepared! That's the secret to staying floofalicious~ <style=SizeSmall>Dresses also make it easier to block runaway plushies... Meh?</style>

content: {A笑眯眯}My plushies and I adore <style=Highlight>dresses</style>. They love playing under the big flowing hem, and I just think the dresses are perfect with my sewing apron.
